00053 void CNGenderEngine::defineOptions() 
00054 {
00055     defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00056     defineOption("", "chrX-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "File containing probes on X chromosome for gender computation.", "");
00057     defineOption("", "chrY-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "File containing probes on Y chromosome for gender computation.", "");
00058     defineOption("", "cel-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Text file specifying cel files to process, one per line with the " "first line being 'cel_files'.", "");
00059     defineOption("", "male-gender-ratio-cutoff", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "Male gender ratio cutoff", "1.3"); 
00060     defineOption("", "female-gender-ratio-cutoff", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT, "Female gender ratio cutoff", "1.0");
00061 
00062 
00063   defineOption("", "check-for-invalid-cel-files", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00064                      "Does an upfront check on the intensities in the input cel files and warns if there are any peculiar values .",
00065                      "false");
00066 
00067 
00068     defineOptionSection("Engine Options (Not used on command line)");
00069     defOptMult( "", "cels", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "CEL files to process.", "");
00070 
00071 }

00074 /**
00075  * @brief Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00076  */
00077 void CNGenderEngine::checkOptionsImp() 
00078 {
00079     std::vector<std::string> celFiles;
00080     EngineUtil::getCelFiles(celFiles, this);
00081     if(celFiles.size() == 0)
00082         Err::errAbort("No cel files specified.");
00083     setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool CNGenderEngine::checkForInvalidCelFiles(const std::vector<std::string>& celFiles)
00088 {
00089     bool returnValue=true;
00090     affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData cel;
00091     for (unsigned int uiCelFileIndex = 0; (uiCelFileIndex < celFiles.size()); uiCelFileIndex++)
00092     {
00093 cout <<  celFiles[uiCelFileIndex].c_str() << endl; 
00094         cel.SetFileName(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex].c_str());
00095         if (!cel.Read()) {Err::errAbort("In CNGenderEngine cannot read cel file for gender calling: " + celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]);}
00096 
00097         unsigned int uiRowCount = cel.GetRows();
00098         unsigned int uiColCount = cel.GetCols();
00099         unsigned int uiCount = uiRowCount * uiColCount;
00100         int maxWarnings = 3;
00101         for (int iProbeIndex = 0; iProbeIndex < uiCount; iProbeIndex++)
00102         {
00103             float fIntensity = cel.GetIntensity(iProbeIndex);
00104             if (fIntensity == 0.0)
00105             {
00106                  if(maxWarnings > 0)
00107                  {
00108                      Verbose::out(1,"CEL file contains zero intensity values:\t" + celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]);
00109                      maxWarnings--;
00110                      returnValue = false;
00111                  }
00112                  continue;
00113             }
00114             else if (fIntensity < 0)
00115             {
00116                 Verbose::out(1,"CEL file contains negative intensity values:\t" + celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]);
00117                 returnValue = false;
00118             }
00119             else if ((double)fIntensity != (double)fIntensity)
00120             {
00121                 Verbose::out(1, "CEL file contains NaN intensity values:\t" + celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]);
00122                 returnValue = false;
00123             }
00124             else if (!Util::isFinite(fIntensity))
00125             {
00126                 Verbose::out(1,"CEL file contains infinite intensity values:\t" + celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]);
00127                 returnValue = false;
00128             }
00129         }
00130     } 
00131     return returnValue;
00132 }
00133 
00134 /**
00135  * @brief Run the specified analysis
00136  */
00137 void CNGenderEngine::runImp() {
00138 
00139         std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> > chrXProbes;
00140         std::vector< std::vector<probeid_t> > chrYProbes;
00141 
00142         EngineUtil::readProbeFile(chrXProbes,getOpt("chrX-probes")); 
00143         EngineUtil::readProbeFile(chrYProbes,getOpt("chrY-probes")); 
00144 
00145         std::vector<std::string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
00146 
00147         if(getOptBool("check-for-invalid-cel-files"))
00148         {
00149             checkForInvalidCelFiles(celFiles); 
00150         }
00151 
00152 
00153         CnProbeGenderCelListener objGenderCaller(       chrXProbes, 
00154                                                         chrYProbes, 
00155                                                         getOptDouble("female-gender-ratio-cutoff"), 
00156                                                         getOptDouble("male-gender-ratio-cutoff"));
00157 
00158         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData cel;
00159 
00160         affx::TsvFile *tsv = new affx::TsvFile;
00161         tsv->writeTsv(Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"genderCalls.txt"));
00162         tsv->defineColumn(    0,0,"Sample Name", affx::TSV_TYPE_INT);
00163         tsv->defineColumn(    0,1,"GenderCall", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00164         tsv->defineColumn(    0,2,"Intensity Ratio", affx::TSV_TYPE_STRING);
00165 
00166         for (unsigned int uiCelFileIndex = 0; uiCelFileIndex < celFiles.size(); uiCelFileIndex++)
00167         {
00168             cel.SetFileName(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex].c_str());
00169             if (!cel.Read()) {error("Cannot read cel file for gender calling: " + celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]);}
00170 
00171             objGenderCaller.newChip(&cel); 
00172             int iMaleCount =0;
00173             int iFemaleCount =0;
00174             int iUnknownCount =0;
00175 
00176             float fRatio = objGenderCaller.getLastRatio();
00177 
00178             tsv->set(0,0,Fs::basename(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]));
00179             tsv->set(0,2,fRatio);
00180             switch(objGenderCaller.getLastGender())
00181             {
00182                 case affx::Male: 
00183                     iMaleCount++; 
00184                     Verbose::out(1, "Sample " + ::getUnsignedInt(uiCelFileIndex + 1) 
00185                                               + ":\t" 
00186                                               + Fs::basename(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]) 
00187                                               + "\tMale\t" 
00188                                               + ::getDouble(fRatio, 6)); 
00189                     tsv->set(0,1,"Male");
00190                     break;
00191 
00192 
00193                 case affx::Female: 
00194                     iFemaleCount++; 
00195                     Verbose::out(1, "Sample " + ::getUnsignedInt(uiCelFileIndex + 1) 
00196                                               + ":\t" 
00197                                               + Fs::basename(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]) 
00198                                               + "\tFemale\t" 
00199                                               + ::getDouble(fRatio, 6)); 
00200                     tsv->set(0,1,"Female");
00201                     break;
00202 
00203 
00204                 default: 
00205                     iUnknownCount++; 
00206                     Verbose::out(1, "Sample " + ::getUnsignedInt(uiCelFileIndex + 1) 
00207                                               + ":\t" 
00208                                               + Fs::basename(celFiles[uiCelFileIndex]) 
00209                                               + "\tUnknown\t" 
00210                                               + ::getDouble(fRatio, 6));
00211                     tsv->set(0,1,"UnknownGender");
00212             }
00213             tsv->writeLevel(0);
00214         }
00215         delete tsv;
00216 }
